thread.title: Wynn Resorts CEO Proposes Taking Wynn Name off Boston Casino Project

author: Chris Kirkham
title: Wynn Resorts CEO Proposes Taking Wynn Name off Boston Casino Project

organizations.name: boston casino project wynn resorts ltd

text:
Wynn Resorts Ltd. Chief Executive Matt Maddox told Massachusetts regulators Friday that he wants to remove the name “Wynn” from a $2.5 billion casino project the company is building in the Boston area.
The move came at a hearing to determine whether former Chairman and CEO Steve Wynn, who resigned in February amid sexual-misconduct allegations, should still be considered legally tied to the casino project.
Mr.... RELATED VIDEO What Steve Wynn Told Employees in Internal Meetings Casino mogul Steve Wynn, facing allegations of sexual misconduct, spoke to Wynn Resorts employees and urged them to have pride in the company. In recordings reviewed by the WSJ, he recalled an exchange with Donald Trump about the "Access Hollywood" recording. Photo: Reuters To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
